full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@012A *, ,SKAL BA DANG LDAN PA KHYED RNAMS KYIS THIG LE BCU DRUG GI DKYIL 'KHOR DU DBANG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA THOB PA YIN PAS, ,DAM TSIG DANG SDOM PA TSUL BZHIN DU BSRUNG BA GZHIR BYAS NAS, ,SDE SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHIS BSDUS PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI GSUNG RAB DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA GDAMS DAG TU SHES PAR BYAS NAS LAM GYI LUS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON PAR BYA DGOS SHING,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,DE LTAR BKA' SRUNG MA GNYIS STAG BCU'I GTOR 'BUL GNAD DON SNYING POR DRIL 'DI YANG, DHVA DZA MEE TRI'I MTSAN CAN RNAM GNYIS GZHUNG, ,JI BZHIN DHARMA BHA DRAS YI GER BRIS, ,SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,SDE DGE'I BAR RKOS PADMA'I BAR DU BSGRUBS PA DGE'O, ,)
